meanings.definition: A row of small columns topped by a rail, used as a barrier on the edge of a balcony or staircase.
meanings.sent1: The balustrade along the staircase kept people from falling off.
meanings.sent2: She leaned against the balustrade, admiring the view from the balcony.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to balance on the balustrade like a tightrope walker.
meanings.sent4: The balustrade stood like a protective army, guarding the edge of the balcony.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the balustrade added elegance to the staircase.
